description: Enable AI assistants to perform real-time web searches, academic paper searches, company research, and more using the Exa AI Search API. Access comprehensive and up-to-date information from multiple sources including web pages, Wikipedia, LinkedIn, GitHub, and research papers. Customize and control which search tools are enabled to tailor the assistant's capabilities to your needs.

deltyApiKey.description: The API key for accessing the Delty API.

tools.name: get_delty_projects
tools.description: Get the list of projects from Delty.

tools.name: get_delty_project_documents
tools.description: Get the all the documents of a project from Delty. The projectId is the id of the project you want to get the documents for. If projectId is not available, use the get_delty_projects tool to get the list of projects and corresponding projectIds. Then use get_delty_project_documents tool to get the documents for the projectId.
